sub_title: Private / Public Sector Engagement Expert in Resilience and Sustainability Affairs
summary:
I am a results-oriented international development expert focused on implementing strategic objectives for value impact, through coherent business propositions to stakeholders, using sustainable development frameworks. Strong reputation within complex international networks, alliances, and partnerships, in developing countries. Extensive cross-cultural experience in designing effective project rollouts, helping governments, the private sector, and multilateral organizations design better and more effective policies and programs. Expert in Due Diligence reports for investment banking in compliance with international standards.
What I bring is:
•	Substantial knowledge and experience in international development in resilience, and climate change-related programs.
•	Substantial experience working in collaborative multi-stakeholder settings, including government, UN agencies, and private sector networks.
•	Substantial knowledge and experience working in complex international networks, partnerships, and alliances, including with global, regional, and local UN and other agencies.
•	Outstanding relationship-building, collaboration, and team-building skills.
•	Substantial experience working remotely in a dynamic virtual teamwork environment as part of a global team.
•	Excellent command of English and Spanish, for personalized hands-on engagement with stakeholders.

profile_positions.description:
• Develop countries' assessment, risks & and strategic advice to UN and other agencies.
• Support science-based evidence research in low/mid-income countries.
• Enable collaborative value, liaising with key actors, at community, local, regional, and global levels.
• Extensive cross-cultural experience and fieldwork with complex international networks in developing countries. 
• Effective and efficient program execution in compliance with donor policies and guidelines.
profile_positions.title: Sustainability Expert

profile_positions.description:
• Institutional assessment of disaster risk and vulnerability, strategies, engagement mechanisms, and current frameworks on disaster risk management related to climate change hazards.
• Research and support network scoping and expansion strategies in Latin America. 
• Identify entry points, and opportunities and provide recommendations for partnerships engagement.
• Engage and validate the findings with governments, chambers of commerce, multilateral agencies, development finance institutions, and private sector organizations at the national and regional levels.
profile_positions.title: Private Sector Consultant for Latin America at UNDP

profile_positions.description:
AUTHORITY OF THE ELECTRICAL SYSTEM OF MASS TRANSPORT - AATE
•	Led the sustainability strategy development and implementation of a $ 7-Billion-dollar project.
•	Built and developed a multi-disciplinary team for the roll-out of a strategy for the prevention and solution of conflicts related to economic displacement, involuntary resettlement, among others.
•	Led the compliance with Safeguards and the stakeholders’ engagement with IDB, World Bank, CAF, KFW, French Agency of Development AFD, BBVA among other investment banks.
•	Led the Involuntary Resettlement assessment, for the Environmental Impact Assessment Study EIAS of Line 2 of the Lima Metro, approved on December 2019.
•	Designed and approved Impact Mitigation Programs, mechanisms for financial inclusion, economic displacement compensation, involuntary resettlement mitigation actions, for US$60M.
•	Impacted over 2,000 people, 740 properties, 350 families, 500 street vendors, 1,200 businesses.
•	Managed the carbon footprint inventory and accounting

profile_positions.title: CONSULTANT

profile_positions.description:
Project: Integrating the SDGs into the Post-Disaster Recovery Process in the North of Peru, financed by ECHO, OFDA, UNDP, UNICEF, FAO, OIT • First evaluation of its kind about the Integration of SDGs in Peru. Evaluation of the actions and reconstruction plans regarding the gaps and operational voids in the reconstruction process in the Piura region, linked to the SDGs.  • Articulation, coordination with regional and local government bodies, multilateral agencies, ministries, and civil society, the integration of ODS in reconstruction plan, for the Piura region. 
Final product: Document with recommendations to local actors to incorporate SDG approaches in the postdisaster recovery process and in their 2018 public budget. 
• Oversee local Risk management policies aligned with Disaster Risk planning. Communications with local authorities.
